title: Purchased the Darkstar Bundle thinking the cover art was thresh....
body:
Low and behold its Kha'Zix, and i'm a support main :(

Any chance riot would refund it so i can buy darkstar thresh instead?

Quite pissed off at the moment.

replies.body:
Hey there,

If you still have some refund tokens left you should be able to follow this guide on [how to process a refund](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ#h2q1) with no issue, however if you have no refund tokens available then you're out of luck unfortunately.
